channel.title: Soichiro Murakami
channel.copyright: © Copyright Soichiro Murakami All Right Reserved

item.description: About me I’m a 2nd-year Ph.D student at Okumura-Takamura group, Tokyo Institute of Technology, supervised by Prof. Manabu Okumura. Previously I received my master’s degree from Tokyo Institute of Technology under the supervision of Prof. Hiroya Takamura. My research interest is natural language generation with neural networks and I’m particularly interested in generating text from non-linguistic data. Also, I am currently working on machine translation as a research engineer at NTT docomo.

Journals 村上聡一朗, 渡邉亮彦, 宮澤彬, 五島圭一, 柳瀬利彦, 高村大也, 宮尾祐介, “時系列株価データからの市況コメントの自動生成”, 自然言語処理, 27-2, pp.299 - 328, (2020.6) Ningping Sun, Soichiro Murakami, Hiroshi Nagaoka, Takuya Shigemoto, “A correction algorithm for stereo matching with general digital cameras and web cameras”, International Journal of Space-Based and Situated Computing, Vol.3, No.3, pp.169 - 184 (2013.9) International Conferences Soichiro Murakami*, Makoto Morishita*, Tsutomu Hirao, Masaaki Nagata (*Equal contribution), “NTT’s Machine Translation Systems for WMT19 Robustness Task”, First Place in the En-Ja Track, The 4th Conference on Machine Translation (WMT19) (2019.
